Title: Upstairs/Downstairs
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Dara Resnik, Tonya Kong (story editor)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Joanne Whalley
Plot: A desperate Dex reaches out for help, Matt forms an uneasy alliance with Agent Nadeem, and Karen concocts a dangerous plan to provoke Fisk.
